name: Oppenheim
description:
Play as some toys exploring the factory where they were created and your dear friend Oppenheim was sentenced to be discontinued and destroyed.

In this 1-4 player(currently only 1 supported) puzzle game you play as a car, monkey, bat and soldier who all have their own unique ability. These will enable everyone to reach the head office on the other side of the factory and destroy the work order before it gets implemented.
